parameters.name: OwnerUid
parameters.description: The user ID of the cost center owner.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The page number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. A maximum of 300 entries can be returned per page.

parameters.name: ParentUnitId
parameters.description: The ID of the parent cost center. A value of -1 indicates the root cost center.
